languages.text: {n}Хормейстер мрачно кивает.{/n} "Наши демоны — наша ноша. Слава Богу-Императору, вы смогли покинуть ее страдающий разум".
languages.translation_comment:
Заккари
Q2 и романс ломается, Кибелла исчезает из ростера навсегда

traits.locale_text: {n}Хормейстер мрачно кивает.{/n} "Наши демоны — наша собственная ноша. Слава Богу-Императору, я смог вытащить вас из больного разума".

languages.translation_comment:
Заккари
Q2 и романс ломается, Кибелла исчезает из ростера навсегда

languages.text: {n}The Choirmaster nods gloomily.{/n} "Our inner horrors are our burdens. Praised be the God-Emperor that you were able to leave her tormented mind."
languages.original_text: {n}Хормейстер мрачно кивает.{/n} "Наши демоны — наша ноша. Слава Богу-Императору, вы смогли покинуть ее страдающий разум".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Choirmaster nods gloomily.{/n} "Our daemons are our burdens. Praised be the God-Emperor that you were able to leave her tormented mind."

{n}The Choirmaster nods gloomily.{/n} "Our inner horrors are our burdens. Praised be the God-Emperor that you were able to leave her tormented mind."

languages.text: {n}Le maître de chœur hoche sombrement la tête.{/n} « Nos cauchemars intérieurs sont des fardeaux parfois difficiles à porter. Loué soit l'Empereur-Dieu, vous avez pu quitter son esprit tourmenté. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster nods gloomily.{/n} "Our inner horrors are our burdens. Praised be the God-Emperor that you were able to leave her tormented mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître de chœur hoche sombrement la tête.{/n} « Nos cauchemars intérieurs sont des fardeaux parfois difficiles à porter. Loué soit l'Empereur-Dieu, vous avez pu quitter son esprit tourmenté. »

languages.text: {n}El maestro del Coro asiente, sombrío.{/n} «Nuestros horrores internos son nuestra carga personal. Doy gracias al Dios Emperador de que haya podido salir de su mente torturada».
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster nods gloomily.{/n} "Our inner horrors are our burdens. Praised be the God-Emperor that you were able to leave her tormented mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro del Coro asiente, sombrío.{/n} «Nuestros horrores internos son nuestra carga personal. Doy gracias al Dios Emperador de que haya podido salir de su mente torturada».

languages.text: {n}クワイアーマスターは暗い表情でうなずく。{/n}「内なる恐怖は足枷になります。あなた様が彼女の苦しみばかりの精神から解放されて何よりです。神帝陛下に感謝しましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster nods gloomily.{/n} "Our inner horrors are our burdens. Praised be the God-Emperor that you were able to leave her tormented mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}クワイアーマスターは暗い表情でうなずく。{/n}「内なる恐怖は足枷になります。あなた様が彼女の苦しみばかりの精神から解放されて何よりです。神帝陛下に感謝しましょう」

languages.text: {n}唱诗大师忧郁地点点头。{/n}“我们内心的恐惧就是我们的负担。感谢神皇，您成功地走出了她痛苦的心灵。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster nods gloomily.{/n} "Our inner horrors are our burdens. Praised be the God-Emperor that you were able to leave her tormented mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}唱诗大师忧郁地点点头。{/n}“我们内心的恐惧就是我们的负担。感谢神皇，您成功地走出了她痛苦的心灵。”

languages.text: {n}Der Chormeister nickt düster.{/n} "Unsere inneren Schrecken sind unsere Bürde. Der Gottimperator sei gepriesen, dass Ihr ihre gequälte Seele verlassen konntet."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster nods gloomily.{/n} "Our inner horrors are our burdens. Praised be the God-Emperor that you were able to leave her tormented mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Chormeister nickt düster.{/n} "Unsere inneren Schrecken sind unsere Bürde. Der Gottimperator sei gepriesen, dass Ihr ihre gequälte Seele verlassen konntet."

languages.text: {n}Koro Şefi, kasvetle başını eğiyor.{/n} "Yüreklerimizdeki dehşetler, sırtımıza yük olmuş. Onun o ızdırap içindeki zihninden ayrılabildiğiniz için Tanrı İmparator'a şükürler olsun."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster nods gloomily.{/n} "Our inner horrors are our burdens. Praised be the God-Emperor that you were able to leave her tormented mind."
